Text: Invitation Last Two AllEmployee Safety MeetingsAugust August Aug PM CDTTry to attend both meetingsyoull be glad you did These meetings will be conducted by Captain Herb Evers of the Bellevue Police Department Herb has a BA in Criminal Justice and is a graduate of the FBI National Academy Are you ready for SURVIVAL KNOWLEDGE FOR THE WORKPLACE Think about it Do you know what to do if confronted by an armed assailant Do you know when most residential burglaries occur In a study of woman who were victims of an attack what was it that out of did that allowed them to escape Where on the human body are the most vulnerable areas of pain and compliance These and other highly important life saving factors will be covered in the safety meetings You will be participating in HANDS ON learninghow to escape from an attack how to safely leave a room without being assaulted THIS IS NOT A MARTIAL ARTS CLASS The instructions are very simple and you will learn easytoremember tactics which will be provided to KEEP YOU SAFE QUARTERLY SAFETY MEETING Room PM Remember to dress casually for the HANDSON Meeting on August PS Should we tell him the glazed donut joke

FW Rate Case Request Cc Attached please find the Excel worksheet that contains responsive information for Northern Border Pipeline Company Please let me know if you have any questions Forwarded by Bambi HeckermanNPNGEnron on PM Ray Neppl AM To Bambi NRON cc Subject FW Rate Case Request Forwarded by Ray NepplNPNGEnron on AM From Tracy nronXgate on AM To Bill MillerIBEW nronxgate Robert nronXgate Ray NRON cc Subject FW Rate Case Request Please update the attached to be used in the Enron Statistical Summary Corporate would like this by the end of the day Friday Please let me know if you are unable to meet this deadline Thanks Tracy Geaccone Original Message From Dominguez Sal Sent Thursday March AM To Geaccone Tracy Subject Rate Case Request Tracy Please update the rate case segment for the Transportation Services page of the Statistical Summary which will be posted on our website I would ideally like to have this by the end of the day tomorrow but let me know if you need more time to complete it Thanks for your help Sal

PAL Postings Cc FYI NBPL and MGT are going to proceed with implementing the PAL transactions posting under the Interruptible Agreements Informational Postings as indicated in Geneva Pattersons email dated February and are targeting April as the first day Thanks Bambi
